'''''Amon Hen'' 293''' is the two-hundred-and-ninety-third issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in February [[2022]].

==Contents==
* Front cover:  Ulmo by Jenna Kass
* '''2''' - From the Editor's Desk
* '''4''' - Tolkien and Haytor Vale by Frances Billinge
* '''7''' - What remains of Beleriand by Gianluca Meluzzi
* '''14''' - Photographing Middle-earth by Ingo Scholtes
* '''18''' - Centerfold: Morgan Rogers for Tolkien Diversity Week
* '''24''' - Annual General Meeting for 2022 by Ian Collie
* '''26''' - Exeter, the AGM Venue by Anna Milon & Ian Collier
* '''28''' - Maglor by Eryn Goetz
* '''30''' - Behind Glass
* '''32''' - Keen on Tolkien: a Poetic Hommage in Colourful Collage by Sultana Raza
* '''34''' - All Br√¢n
* Back cover: Thranduil in Winter by Soni Alcorn-Hender
